name: StreamLine (itch) (Minecrafterx279)
description:
StreamLine is a game of madness and has no aim.

That's all I have to say

other than that enjoy :)

Please Report Any bugs you find in the official discord server

JackStudiosOfficial Discord Server: https://discord.gg/94VJQVD

Controls:

use the arrow keys to move, press r to reset the game (for if it gets laggy), use spacebar to make all colored blocks move toward the cursor, press shift to instantly teleport all colored  blocks to cursor
